title: Attached & Detached Garages Available, Plank-Wood Flooring
map_address: 15930 E Briarwood Cr near E Davies Dr
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1346 Sq.

Choose from one of our spacious one-, two- or three-bedroom floorplans, each with expansive nine-foot ceilings and exceptional features including full-sized washers and dryers, expansive walk-in closets, balconies or patios, wood-style plank flooring and deep soaking tubs.
Our custom kitchens have stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, designer tile backsplash and pendant lighting.
We have everything to provide the lifestyle as exceptional as you here at Caliber at Cornerstar.

Private Patio/Balcony, Beautiful New 1-, 2-, and 3-Bedroom Apartment Homes, Plank-Wood Flooring, Beautiful Kitchens with Granite Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, and Island, Door-to-Door Rubbish Pick-Up Service, Central Heat & Air Conditioning, Spacious Master Bedroom with Walk-In Closet, Washer & Dryer in Home

Pet-Friendly Community, Resident Clubhouse with Business Center, State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, and Media Room, Resort Inspired Swimming Pool with Outdoor Lounge, Fire-Pit, and BBQ Grilling Area, On-Site Management with Courtesy Package Acceptance, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, and On-Call Courtesy Patrol, Attached & Detached Garages Available
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
